website_summaries.verdict: Similar in shape and price to the Contigo, but our Best of the Best choice has a slightly better design.
pros: Vacuum seal and double-walled construction in a streamlined design
Comes with a 1 year manufacturer's warranty
cons: Some testers found the lid design makes this model somewhat awkward to use

customer_reviews.title: customer for life
customer_reviews.text: I stand behind this company because they stand behind their product! Color is true as represented in all of the pictures and it actually keeps hot beverages hot! My favorite feature by far, is the locking mechanism that prevents ANY spills from occurring. It fits perfectly in any car cup holder and the fact that this company went through the FDA process speaks loudly about their reputation and ethics. I have already purchased 2 (for myself and boyfriend) and I would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Blessed and highly favored

customer_reviews.title: REVISED REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: NEW OPINION: bought this one and one of a champagne color ... they both retain heat equally well however the lid design differs ... the opening spring on the gold one has failed already ... the champagne lid design is far superior in both construction and functionality and it comes apart for cleaning ... don't know about the lid design on the other colors but check before you buy ...
customer_reviews.author: N.AA..

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought two; one gold and one dark blue. Keeps hot for a very long time. There is no question about that. But my blue one, as you can see in the pictures, is not holding up on the outside. I'm very disappointed with that. They are only a couple months old. The paint should not peel off like this.
customer_reviews.author: mkconner911

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Love this tumbler. I actually have a couple of them. Keeps my coffee or tea hot for several hours. Have bought more expensive tumblers but always come back to this one. It is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Spence

customer_reviews.title: I really love this thermos
customer_reviews.text: I really love this thermos. Keeps you drink hot for many hours. I'm giving it four not five stars because the screw that connects the flip-top lid in the back has been moving on me. I hope it holds up. I got the gold color and I get compliments on how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: nan

customer_reviews.title: Hot Coffee to go!
customer_reviews.text: Love my LifeSky Stainless Steel Insulated Travel Mug. It keeps my coffee hot for hours, and looks great. The size is perfect, and the locking lid is great. I highly recommend this mug! Received it quickly and the service experience gets and A+.
customer_reviews.author: lc

customer_reviews.title: Product Defective
customer_reviews.text: Seal on rim broke as per my daughter I bought it for as a gift. She reports that the lid will not pop open and has to be opened manually and held open while she consumes her drink. She has hand washed the item, so t is not caused by say a dishwasher. I would like this item replaced if I can return it without having to buy another outright. I had bought this item for myself previously and remain satisfied by the one which I currently and using without incident.
customer_reviews.author: Luciusmac

customer_reviews.title: The color is great and when I saw the reviews I thought that ...
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely upset with this purchase. The color is great and when I saw the reviews I thought that it must be good. The first I purchased, lasted approximately 2-3 months until the screw that holds the lid came off and got lost. so that was the end of that. Then I decided to try it again and I recently bought another one. It lasted about 2 months until one day I took it out of my bag and surprise, the coffee was all over my bag. Nice color and nice design, but the product is cheap and it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Londy Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: This is my second one of these mugs and I am pleased with how long it keeps my coffee hot
customer_reviews.text: Thw lock does not stay locked on the lid which could be a problem if it accidentally opens in my lunch bag. This is my second one of these mugs and I am pleased with how long it keeps my coffee hot.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Love this Cup!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cup. It keeps my liquids nice and warm for 2+ hours, allowing me time to slowly drink and enjoy instead have having to take drastic gulps.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing how far thermo containers have come
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing how far thermo containers have come. This keeps temperature for many hours. If it the coffee was scorching out of the pot it will be scorching for hours after in the LifeSky. The one-handed open feature is really nice. I would have given it 5 stars but I found it a little annoying that the lid doesn't open enough... it almost touches my nose when I drink.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy T

customer_reviews.title: NOT worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. I bought this as a "to go coffee cup" and ended up with a leaky water bottle. It gets hot when you pour your coffee in (as in too hot to hold), leaked everywhere, the inside of the lid hits your forehead when you tip it to drink out of leaving a dot of coffee on your head, you cant put dairy in it (I use milk in my coffee), not dishwasher safe etc etc I would not buy another one
customer_reviews.author: stefenie c.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee hot for hours and hours and hours.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Love the color. Got compliments on the color. Keeps coffee hot for hours and hours and hours. == 2020 update == bought in nov 2019, this is a great mug, keeps coffee hot! you can't find me anywhere without this mug present, everywhere! however, today, after cleaning (filling with water and shaking with soap), the seal finally broke and it no longer keeps warm. i first noticed the outside was warm/hot to touch, then the drink cooled. not sure where the seal is broken, but time to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Vederman

customer_reviews.title: Hot coffee for hours.
customer_reviews.text: First off it keeps my hot coffee hot for hours. After 4-5 hours it was more than warm. Wish it was bigger capacity. At one point the pin came loose on the hinge and it took some effort to reassemble it for continued use. Update: part of the spring in the hinge corroded and feel into my mouth as I was sipping coffee. It’s insulation is the only thing I can commend. Hinge needs a redesign. Unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I approve of the quality of construction and ability to open the lock and lid with one hand. I wish it was larger and had less small crevices that needed cleaning but those are marginal problems that most mugs also have. This mug has the odd behavior of not fully opening when you push the button to pop the top, you need to push the top slightly further for it to lock into place fully open and fully extended. Without pushing the top into this position I cannot drink from the mug without the inside of the top hitting me in the nose.
customer_reviews.author: P. England

customer_reviews.title: I like the size and the fact that you can lock ...
customer_reviews.text: LifeSky Stainless Steel Insulated Travel container. I like the size and the fact that you can lock it. So far so good! I use this for my hot drinks and use a different one for my cold drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Huey

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the lock feature and that this keeps my coffee cold for hours! The color is very cute and it is extremely easy to clean. I would give it 5 starts, but after 2 years of heavy use, the color has started peeling off. I *probably* shouldn’t knock it down a whole star for that but it is a bummer the pretty color is coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Schumann

customer_reviews.title: good until it fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Keeps things hot and cold. attractive and sleek, fits into the side pocket on my bag. but two problems: the design makes the inside of the lid hit your face when you drink, and the hinge mechanism fell apart. I'll be asking for a replacement or refund. EDIT: refund issued, customer service was great!
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Really,  really insulates
customer_reviews.text: I've bought three of these. I would never have suspected that stainless steel would keep things so warm. I filled mine with black coffee at about 7:45 this morning. It's now 5:20 PM, and die to various interruptions and circumstances I'm just now getting to it. It's still very, very warm, just about ideal drinking temperature for me. That's 10 hours! No off taste, either
customer_reviews.author: Susan Chambless

customer_reviews.title: Really great
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new coffee mug that wouldn’t leak in my backpack. This is great!! And it keeps my coffee hot all morning. Two issues though: it is a little awkward to drink from because the lid hits my forehead when I tip it back, since there’s a little nub for leak protection. Also, I ordered another one for my boyfriend and it arrived smelling like tea, like it had already been used. Other than that, it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing I poured my coffee in it 5 hours ago ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing I poured my coffee in it 5 hours ago and it is just now starting to loose heat and is still warm/hot instead of hot/hot!! It is super cute too which makes it an even better product. I know it says that it will keep something hot or cold for I think 12 hours, but I'm just glad it keeps it hot for 5 my other coffee mugs I will have cool coffee in 30 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Payne

customer_reviews.title: ... my coffee very hot and the flip lid is great on my drive to work
customer_reviews.text: This cup keeps my coffee very hot and the flip lid is great on my drive to work. However the pin that holds the lid that flips keeps coming out. I have to keep a constant eye on it. Of course I am 4 days past being able to return it. Good luck with yours if you get one.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first coffee mug from LifeSky. My first one was bought in 2016 and it lasted 3 years. This product is without a doubt good investment and works as described. In addition, I think it is affordable compare to other product out there. I would recommend this product to any one who needs a travel coffee mug. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: ABK

customer_reviews.title: Not a good mug.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst travel mug ever. I read the negative reviews before I bought this but there were so few I figured they were one-offs. The guy who complained about the design was spot on. Drinking out of this was so awkward!!! The rubber seal/tip is literally ON your nose while you drink. On top of looking ridiculous it forces you to lean your head waaaay back to drink. And then you spill. Every. Time. A month into owning mine it broke. The lid flipped off for good and I’m so glad to be done with this. Edit: after seeing my review the company gave me a full refund for mug.
customer_reviews.author: Jmcomerford

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, one black for my husband, & sent both back immediately. I loved the colors, but as soon as I went to put liquid in the cup, it leaked all over me. It basically had no seal to it. I was very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: afischer82

customer_reviews.title: Burned my tongue 6 hours later
customer_reviews.text: Well I found what I was looking for in this travel mug. I wanted something that would keep my coffee got even if I forgot about it for a couple hours. I have now forgotten about it multiple times for hours and then tried to drink too fast and burned my tongue many time. This cup is great! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Annaliese Steuermann

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty color and keeps contents hot. My only complaint, and reason for the 4 stars, is that it leaks! Only a bit at a time, but enough to keep a towel or napkin around just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: The locking kid is a nice feature. The only negative is the color peels ...
customer_reviews.text: This travel mug is totally leak-proof and keeps beverages hot/cold for hours. The locking kid is a nice feature. The only negative is the color peels off the outside of the mug.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Great with Few Faults
customer_reviews.text: This is the third bottle I’ve bought from them. I love it. Only complaints are the bottom piece came off and the finish starts to wear down over time. Still a great bottle. Keeps everything hot/cold all day long.
customer_reviews.author: m.pay

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 16 ounce Champaigne color and there is no problem with the lid. I got tired of buying contigo brand travel mugs. EVERYONE has contigo and all the mugs get mixed at school. Price is the same as contigo 16 ounce. These are definitely better than contigo brand in terms of design and style. It does keep liquids hot for a few hours and does the job. Heard some people say the color comes off, hasn't happened yet but will see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Seller was amazing to offer quick feeedback and supply replacement. I'm confident the new mug will hold up. Thank you!! The plastic inside this lid broke quickly. If lid was more durable it would get 5 stars because it really works well for hot and cold liquids.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T.

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 starts if possible
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a 4.5 starts if available. It drips a little out the back, but I still use very often.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa Martyn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Perfectly Useful
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I've seen people post about the rubber part hitting their nose but... dude, it goes back farther if you just push it a little more and then it doesn't hit my nose at all. So... try that! And then it works really well!
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Garcia

customer_reviews.title: The perfect travel mug
customer_reviews.text: This travel mug is absolutely amazing! I've had a really hard time finding something that wouldn't leak or take up too much space. This one is perfect. It keeps my coffee hot for a long time (I usually wind up drinking it when I get to work and it tastes as if I've just made it). The sleep design makes it easy for me to slide it into my bag, and I'm not afraid of it leaking everywhere. I absolutely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa V

customer_reviews.title: Love the color as well
customer_reviews.text: I poured my coffee about 90 minutes ago and it is still PIPING HOT. Almost too hot to drink! I am a fan! Thank you! Love the color as well :)
customer_reviews.author: tbtrfli

customer_reviews.title: Not the best item out there; update: A company that cares about their clients!
customer_reviews.text: It holds heat for a good six hours but leaks if it's flipped over. The locking mechanism is also not full proof and the lid has opened on me a couple times which then leads to my coffee pouring out everywhere. I wouldn't say it's terrible, but I definitely wouldn't buy it again and I've only had it for a month. Update: I have to give credit to this company! They really do care about their clients. After my review, the company reached out and is sending me a replacement. I think that speaks volumes, and I greatly appreciate that. I will be back in about a month to give an updated review on this product. Thanks lifesky!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Lerma

customer_reviews.title: Keeps liquid hot!
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it is stainless steel. It definitely keeps hot liquids hot all day, I have to leave the lid open as I can't drink things overly hot. The only negative thing I have to say about it is the design. The lid is in front of your nose when it is open. This makes it difficult to drink out of, especially half way through your drink.
customer_reviews.author: MarlieRN

customer_reviews.title: Love this cup!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. The first one lost a little metal piece that holds the lid on. I would love to find out if it's fixable. This is a great cup. I use it all day. I can put coffee in this cup and it's still warm 5 hours later. The funny thing is that it still tastes good too!
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: top already broke off just opening it!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing !!! Kept my coffee HOT not warm for a long time. Till the top broke off when it was just opened. Sad really, for the price and how great it kept the drink warm.
customer_reviews.author: chrystal dutton

customer_reviews.title: Paint/coating already chipping off less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job keeping my coffee hot! It stays hot for hourssss! BUT I bought the ‘champagne’ one and the coating is already chipping off!! 😭 So that’s really disappointing. I bought this for myself as a birthday gift back in September. I have only used it probably 10 times and wash according to recommendation. It should not be chipping off already! I would recommend just getting the stainless steel one because eventually it will end up looking that way anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Great mug!
customer_reviews.text: Ok how this mug has less than 5/5 stars is crazy. I used this mug for the first time today, brewed my coffee at 7am and it’s STILL WARM at 4:10pm.. What!? I also threw it in my purse to commute (I ride a bug, so it gets thrown around a bit) didn’t spill. This was my first day using it, so if it goes bad quickly I will report back, but so far I love it. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: 6 hours still hot!
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical about this but it really does hold the heat for a long time! 6 hours later and i still burned my tounge definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: loving that it doesn't leak and the paint doesn't peel ...
customer_reviews.text: loving that it doesn't leak and the paint doesn't peel. My son loves this type of flip top with a lock. This is going to be my go-to water bottle: I will buy more
customer_reviews.author: Anne Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: NOT 16 oz
customer_reviews.text: diappointed it does NOT hold 16 oz. it will hold 12 It is BEAUTIFUL though. I does NOT fit under the Kurieg either. I have hot water in it now, I may be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: A.Vittur

customer_reviews.title: Already leaking!!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this thermos 2 months ago and now it is leaking. What a waste of my money. The return window is closed. They probably know it would leak after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Lovely look & practical lock. Seriously, feel safe to place it in your handbag. Also It is a pretty shimmer color. I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Great thermo!
customer_reviews.text: By far it's my fav thermo and it keeps my coffee hot from about 7am till 1pm'ish and that's pretty good for me considering I normally drink my coffee by 9 or 10am (I'm in the medical field). I love the safety lock, its a great feature since I sometimes place it in my purse. Cons: every day I have to disassemble the cap parts to clean it or it molds up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nirys&Ash

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! It literally kept my coffee not warm but HOT all day. Couldn’t believe the temperature it kept. Also, the lock on the top was an unexpected bonus (didn’t see that when I purchased) and the drinking spout is SO much better than any other thermos I’ve had. Love love love and highly recommend. My husband has it is gray, too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It keeps liquids super hot, beware
customer_reviews.text: It keeps liquids super hot, beware. It seals fantastically. The only negative, and don't know what else you could do in the design, is that the lid can get in the way of your line of sight and hit your nose. But is is definitely the best travel mug I have purchased. $15 was a fantastic price. I have sen the same for up to $35.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Keeps beverages hot for hours
customer_reviews.text: Love the travel mug, I've ordered several in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Two Tea

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Coffee Hot
customer_reviews.text: What a well designed coffee mug. Take it with me on a round of golf, and coffee is still hot after 18 holes. Sometimes I put in a couple of ice cubes because its so hot.
customer_reviews.author: TRMartin

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this thermos
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this thermos. It looks so fab in the gold/champagne color and keeps my drink cold and icy for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Fabmom

customer_reviews.title: I'd give it 5 stars if it where actually a ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it 5 stars if it where actually a mug. It's really a small thermos. The description is miss leading. Still works for sending my wife to work with a coffee to go since she can get cups at work, but the 2nd one I got is now going to be a back up since I can't get a coffee cup at work.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect size and not too wide
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was excited to get this cup. It is the perfect size and not too wide. However it leaked both times I used it. But the company immediately refunded me and sent me a replacement which works perfect. I would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite drink insulated container for travel
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. I love it. I purchase two different colors, one for my cold drink and one for the hot. It fits perfectly in my drink holder. It performed as promised. I may be purchasing some as gifts in the coming year.
customer_reviews.author: CHERRY R

customer_reviews.title: I would NOT buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: The spring from the lid broke after 2 years of use. Also, the pin that secures the spring moved around trying to come off. I need to often push back in. A good looking bottle, but useless at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Maria A. Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Stays hot for a long time time & never leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Stayed hot for hours & hours! My doctor told me to drink something warm If I wake up in the middle of the night. I just put hot water in, & a tea bag & it's still hot hours later. I also use it for just water. It doesn't leak at all, when it get thrown around the car.
customer_reviews.author: CRZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect... keeps my coffee hot plus easy to use. Fits well in my golf cart!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Lid makes mug almost unusable
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the mug keeps the coffee hot for a long time. However the lid is so poorly designed that it's almost impossible to drink without getting poked in the eye, rendering all the other positives of the mug moot.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Mathieu

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steele mug beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful. I bought for one of my grandchildren. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: really keeps cold liquids cold well!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it keeps my ice in place for 24 hours as I refill the water. Using the alternate cap, it seals well and opens easily. I will probably buy a second one so I have more water.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Lids broke after two days
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of them for a bachelorette. They are beautiful, but on two of them the lid hinges broke over, after only two days of use. And the other reviews were right about the sipping part being in a weird place - right where the locking latch is..... it's strange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this mug. My husband uses this every day for work..
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thermos Ive ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thermos Ive ever had! I make my hot coffee around 7 am and head to work. In the classroom I can't drink my coffee all at once so I usually always wind up with cold coffee. With this thermos it is still hot at 2;30 when my day is done. Looks sleek, and it does what it says, keeps your drink hot.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent at keeping temperature. Little bit awkward to drink from it. Takes time to get used to the spout shape.
customer_reviews.author: adrian rivera

customer_reviews.title: ... is a very high quality travel mug with an excellent sealing cap and beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality travel mug with an excellent sealing cap and beautiful color. I just wish it was a little shorter and wider so it could fit under my Keurig. Even if I remove the Keurig tray, the mug still doesn't fit. If it did, this would be a 5 star rating!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to carry with you everywhere. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: deborah woods

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my beverage hot for a very long time. I usually take 2 cups of coffee 1 hour apart.
customer_reviews.author: Fallenpieta

customer_reviews.title: Keep warm around 2 hours
customer_reviews.text: Keep warm time is only around 2 hours but what do you expect with the price plus nobody want to carry a bottle of hot water/tea/coffee whole day without drinking. Overall quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee HOT
customer_reviews.text: I had this mug for 2 years before losing it recently. This mug would keep my coffee very hot throughout my 10 hour workday. I liked that it had a lock function so I could easily throw it in my bag to make transporting it easier, and it never leaked! I have tried similar travel mugs but have yet to find one that compares.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: This tumbler is great for people who need to throw their coffee in ...
customer_reviews.text: This tumbler is great for people who need to throw their coffee in their bag in a rush. Once locked mode, the tumbler does not leak or open suddenly on its own. The only downfall I have seen is that the paint has chipped off, which is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Josen

customer_reviews.title: It keeps my tea hot for hours and I love how chic and classy it looks
customer_reviews.text: This mug is my go-to! It keeps my tea hot for hours and I love how chic and classy it looks! I’ve thrown it into my giant purse before not realizing it was still half full, and it didn’t leak a drop!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and really unique color. Stainless steal is great for keeping liquids hot or cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Locking lid is awesome. Doesn't feel hot with hot liquids in it
customer_reviews.text: Locking lid is awesome. Doesn't feel hot with hot liquids in it. Keeps coffee warm and is sparkly and luxurious looking. Looks like it will last me awhile. Needless to say, I am impressed. Never knew a coffee mug could be so fancy. ****EDIT**** I had to edit my review. It is not indestructible. I have only hand washed the item and have not dropped it either. The mugs lip part had separated a minuscule amount and is no longer leak proof. Now this is just an expensive and shiny piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McPeak

customer_reviews.title: If you love coffee, you have to buy this cup!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cup, you're coffee will still be hot in the afternoon. It also doesn't have any of those weird gaps where coffee and water can get stuck, easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.author: Shandel R.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my coffee HOT!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this every work day for my cooffe and today I washed it and the top came apart!!! WHAT AM I GOING TO DO?!?!???????
customer_reviews.author: Renee F.

customer_reviews.title: Omg one of the best
customer_reviews.text: These are the only good mugs I'll ever buy. Keeps your coffee warm all day. Love it so much. I start work at 8 and when I leave at 5, the coffee is still warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad lid design!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, keeps beverage hot, and leak proof. Unfortunately the poor lid design makes it useless, hits your nose/forehead and hinders vision. Wish I had read the reviews more thoroughly, this is a throw away for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, and fully functional
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cup. It's super functional and has a sleek attractive look. I put my tea in this for work. I go to work for 9:30 am and by 6:30pm when I leave wrk my tea is still hot. Amazing price as well
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Good cup
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this cup for years and I love it. It does leak a bit and sometimes comes unlocked while in my lunch box otherwise I love it
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Keep Liquids Very Hot
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it is easy to use and locks very securely; I can actually shake it, tip it, drop it or anything else I want to and it won't even let out a drop, and it is very easy to flip open and use. However, I do wish that it could keep liquids hot for longer amounts - and it does keep them fairly insulated - but not for as long as other mugs I've used. Even though I wish the company would change that, I do overall love the mug and it is very easy just to take on the go. I would definitely recommend/purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product, use with pleasure, the liquid does not pass well and holds heat
customer_reviews.author: Kovtun Natalija

customer_reviews.title: I DO NOT recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.text: This bottle leaks out the back where the hinges are located. The bottle was filled with hot coffee. The bottle also exploded with coffee when I opened the lid to drink. The bottle was filled completely. I am returning this item. It’s has zero functionality. I would not recommend this item to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Nack

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: The best tumbler ever. Keeps hot drinks burning hot for hours. I dropped it a couple of times and it didn't spill a drop. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Locking lid is a plus!
customer_reviews.text: Durable and holds temp inside very well. Daughter loves it over others boight in the past.
customer_reviews.author: G J M

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended! no spills,  easy clean, keep it warm, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought one in the past for my daughter, and now one for my son. They absolutely love it! Doesn't spill, keep their coffee warm and its easy to clean! I'm planning to buy two more, for myself and my husband. Very good price for excellent product. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Janina Perez

customer_reviews.title: BEST MUG EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't leak. It stays warm for hours. The first time I used it I almost burned my mouth because my coffee was still that warm and it was a good half hour after I poured it. I've had it about 9 months now and there's no scratches on it and I have been pretty rough with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Hard to drink from
customer_reviews.text: Although this is very nice and perfect sized, it is hard to drink from. The lid touches my forehead every time I drink from it. It has also left coffee marks on my forehead. My bottom lip rests on the open button as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon s.

customer_reviews.title: Hot hot hot
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my coffee VERY hot for hours.... more then 8 hours... and I mean piping hot. No leaks whatsoever. Lock works well. If you’re looking for a travel mug, this is 100% worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: This looks nice and keeps water cold all day
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice and keeps water cold all day. I do not leave water in it overnight as I spotted a little rust on the outside - bottom of cap portion - after frequent use.
customer_reviews.author: 113agape

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a great travel mug. I especially love the locking feature. It doesn't leak and keeps my coffee hot for several hours. It hold approximately 2 cups of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: WilliamB

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Not the same color in person. Great product though. Wish I hadn't lost it. :/
customer_reviews.author: Janice R.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This mug has not only allowed for spill proof travel but has kept my coffee HOT for more than 9 hours now. Not luke warm, but hot. I would highly recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Best mug I have EVER owned!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best travel mug I have ever owned!!! Coffee stays hot for over 5 hours and warm for 12! I received this mug as a birthday present, but have since went in and bought two more for people in my family!! LOVE ❤️ ☕️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it hot!
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the travel cups I have tried, this one keeps my coffee hot the longest...don't put it in the dishwasher though as the outside will peel off.
customer_reviews.author: Jera Thompson

customer_reviews.title: THIS MUG IS AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I work a very fast paced job and cannot always finish my coffee so generally speaking I am stuck with cold coffee. NOT ANYMORE!! I poured coffee into this mug at 7am and at 5pm the coffee that was left in the mug was still hot! THIS MUG IS AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: B. Watt

customer_reviews.title: Does What it Says!
customer_reviews.text: This mug keeps the hot drink hot for hours which is just what I wanted. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elane C

customer_reviews.title: I really want to love it. It looks beautiful and doesn't leak
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love it. It looks beautiful and doesn't leak, and does keep coffee hot. It's just annoying that when you go to drink out of it, your nose bumps into the cap and you can't really drink much. It makes for kind of a disappointing and awkward coffee drinking experience.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Love this cup!
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what its meant to. Keeps my coffee hot on my morning commute. Doesn't leak like some other cups I've received.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Color is beautiful. Hold the temp of the liquid really well and locks well. Is completely leak proof. Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.author: Abby Lanious

product_meta.title: LifeSky Stainless Steel Insulated Travel Coffee Mug, Double Wall Vacuum Insulated Water Bottle, BPA Free Flip Cap for 1-Hand Operation 16 oz (Champagne)
product_meta.description: Color:ChampagneA True "No-Spill" Travel Mug - Keeps Drinks Hot & Fresh For Hours. When it comes to so-called leak proof travel mugs, you've been burned. LITERALLY. There's nothing worse than heading into a meeting with coffee stains all over your shirt! But with the LifeSky insulated travel coffee mug, leaks are a distant memory. The unique vertical safety lock on the lid seals in your liquid securely to prevent leaks and accidental spills. Thanks to innovative vacuum insulation technology, air is sucked out to create a vacuum between the double walls, minimizing the effect of outside temperature. Your coffee or tea stays piping hot, fresh, and delicious for up to 6 hour sand cold drinks stay chilled. The LifeSky mug looks great, too! Crafted from premium stainless steel, it comes in an array of colors, with an attractive baked finish that resists fingerprints. Whether you're going camping, hiking, or just have a long commute, this thermos is the perfect travel companion! - Double-wall construction for excellent insulation - Convenient one-hand operation - Push-button flip-top lid - Food-grade stainless steel - Lid locks to prevent accidental spills - Keeps liquids hot for up to 8 hours - Great quality, solid and sturdy - Holds 16 oz. of liquid - BPA-free - Drink from it directly, or pour into cup - Easy to clean - Fits most car cup holders (2.6" D, 9" H) - Great gift for men & women. Click "Add to Cart" to buy now!.
feature_bullets: Retains Temperature For Up To 8 Hours: Vacuum-seal technology and double-wall construction ensure superior insulation for hot or cold liquids.
Truly Leakproof: Will not leak! The only mug with a vertical lid lock. Ensures no accidental spills and allows for convenient 1-hand operation.
Safe & Nontoxic: BPA-free lid and food-grade stainless steel mean there are no chemicals that can leech into contents. Drink with peace of mind.
Slim & Sleek: Fits most car cup holders (2.6" D, 9.5" H), with a fingerprint-proof finish. Comes in champagne and dark grey.
1-Year Warranty: Buy without risk! If you have any issues with our travel mug within 12 months, we'll replace it at no cost.
